attr.title: Glass Moon
attr.desc: Too much stress will turn your dream into an unstable bullet hell. A short but challenging cute 'em up.
attr.inst: Download at itch.io (https://doctor-succubus.itch.io/glass-moon) and copy data.win and options.ini into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download at [itch.io](https://doctor-succubus.itch.io/glass-moon) and copy data.win and options.ini into assets folder.
